content: I don't have personal beliefs or opinions, but based on current trends, it's likely that we will continue to see a shift towards online news outlets in the future. with the growing popularity of smartphones and social media platforms, readers are increasingly turning to digital media for their news consumption. online news outlets have also become more accessible and convenient, allowing readers to access news from anywhere and at any time. additionally, the covid-19 pandemic has accelerated the shift to digital media, as people rely more heavily on online news sources for accurate and up-to-date information. the technological advancements in artificial intelligence and machine learning are also revolutionizing the journalism industry, allowing for more personalized news content, real-time reporting, and automated news writing.
